players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and she is Mafia. We must vote her out."
You: "That is a lie, Charlie. I investigated you last night and you are Mafia. We should vote for Charlie."
You: "Charlie is lying to save himself. I investigated him and he is Mafia. Trust me, vote Charlie."
Bob: "I investigated both Charlie and Alice last night. Neither of them is Mafia. I believe in the rule of evidence, not suspicion."
Charlie: "Bob, you're lying. There's only one detective. I am the detective and Alice is Mafia. Vote Alice."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
